timeline.message: Remove duplicate logging, exception is messaged to user further up in callstack

Improve error message when 'failing to get auth token'.

Getting an auth token requires a valid password, it is the most
likely error. Users do not have context to know what 'token' refers
to, the error message is updated here for better formatting and
to be more upfront that a bad password is a likely cause.
